### Total Score Calculation
The total score is calculated as the average of all element scores:
\[ \text{Total Score} = \frac{\sum \text{Element Scores}}{\text{Number of Elements}} = \frac{0.666667 \times 5 + 1.0 \times 5}{10} = 3.666667 \]

This score reflects a generally good alignment with the prompt, with some areas for improvement in capturing the full essence of certain attributes like cyberpunk aesthetics and photorealism.
